languages.text: "Ты — мо{mf|й|я} Домин. Я — твой клинок. Острота моя в благословении твоем. Руки мои крепки, пока крепка воля твоя. Поступь моя неслышна, пока Неумирающий внемлет твоим молитвам". {n}Лезвие целует ладонь культистки, и темная кровь растекается по дну ритуальной чарки, возникшей в ее руках.{/n}

"You are my Domin. I am your blade, and I am honed by your blessing. My arms are strong while your will is strong. And as long as the Undying One hears your prayers, my feet will go unheard." {n}Her blade kisses her palm, and dark blood begins to trickle and spread over the bottom of the ritual cup that has just now appeared in her hands.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ты — мо{mf|й|я} Домин. Я — твой клинок. Острота моя в благословении твоем. Руки мои крепки, пока крепка воля твоя. Поступь моя неслышна, пока Неумирающий внемлет твоим молитвам". {n}Лезвие целует ладонь культистки, и темная кровь растекается по дну ритуальной чарки, возникшей в ее руках.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You are my Domin. I am your blade, and I am honed by your blessing. My arms are strong while your will is strong. And as long as the Undying One hears your prayers, my feet will go unheard." {n}Her blade kisses her palm, and dark blood begins to trickle and spread over the bottom of the ritual cup that has just now appeared in her hands.{/n}

"You are my Enim. I am your blade, and your blessing is my sharpness. My arms are strong so long as your will is strong. My feet are not heard while the Undying One hears your prayers." {n}The blade kisses the cultist's slender wrist, and dark blood spreads across the bottom of the ritual chalice that arose in her hands.{/n}

"You are my Enim. I am your blade, and I am honed by your blessing. My arms are strong while as your will is strong. And as long as the Undying One hears your prayers, my feet will go unheard." {n}The blade kisses the cultist's slender wrist, and dark blood begins to trickle and spread over the bottom of the ritual chalice that has just now appeared in her hands.{/n}

languages.text: "Ihr seid {mf|mein|meine} Domin. Ich bin Eure Klinge, und Euer Segen schärft mich. Meine Arme sind stark, solange Euer Wille stark ist. Und solange der Todlose Eure Gebete hört, wird niemand meine Schritte hören." {n}Ihre Klinge küsst ihr Handfläche, und dunkles Blut tropft in den Ritualbecher, der gerade in ihren Händen erschienen ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You are my Domin. I am your blade, and I am honed by your blessing. My arms are strong while your will is strong. And as long as the Undying One hears your prayers, my feet will go unheard." {n}Her blade kisses her palm, and dark blood begins to trickle and spread over the bottom of the ritual cup that has just now appeared in her hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid {mf|mein|meine} Domin. Ich bin Eure Klinge, und Euer Segen schärft mich. Meine Arme sind stark, solange Euer Wille stark ist. Und solange der Todlose Eure Gebete hört, wird niemand meine Schritte hören." {n}Ihre Klinge küsst ihr Handfläche, und dunkles Blut tropft in den Ritualbecher, der gerade in ihren Händen erschienen ist.{/n}

languages.text: «Usted es mi Domin. Yo soy su arma, y su bendición me afila. Mis brazos serán fuertes mientras su voluntad sea fuerte. Y, mientras el Inmortal escuche sus oraciones, mis pasos serán silenciosos». {n}Su daga besa su palma y un oscuro reguero de sangre cae sobre la copa ritual que acaba de sacar de alguna parte.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You are my Domin. I am your blade, and I am honed by your blessing. My arms are strong while your will is strong. And as long as the Undying One hears your prayers, my feet will go unheard." {n}Her blade kisses her palm, and dark blood begins to trickle and spread over the bottom of the ritual cup that has just now appeared in her hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Usted es mi Domin. Yo soy su arma, y su bendición me afila. Mis brazos serán fuertes mientras su voluntad sea fuerte. Y, mientras el Inmortal escuche sus oraciones, mis pasos serán silenciosos». {n}Su daga besa su palma y un oscuro reguero de sangre cae sobre la copa ritual que acaba de sacar de alguna parte.{/n}

languages.text: 「あなたは私のドミン。私はあなたの刃で、あなたの祝福で磨かれる。あなたの意思が強いうちは、私の力も強い。そして不死の者にあなたの祈りが届く限り、私の足音が聞こえることはない」{n}彼女の刃がその手のひらに口付けして、パッと彼女の手に現れた儀式用のカップの底に黒い血が滴り落ち、じわりと広がった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You are my Domin. I am your blade, and I am honed by your blessing. My arms are strong while your will is strong. And as long as the Undying One hears your prayers, my feet will go unheard." {n}Her blade kisses her palm, and dark blood begins to trickle and spread over the bottom of the ritual cup that has just now appeared in her hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは私のドミン。私はあなたの刃で、あなたの祝福で磨かれる。あなたの意思が強いうちは、私の力も強い。そして不死の者にあなたの祈りが届く限り、私の足音が聞こえることはない」{n}彼女の刃がその手のひらに口付けして、パッと彼女の手に現れた儀式用のカップの底に黒い血が滴り落ち、じわりと広がった。{/n}

languages.text: “你是我的秘者，我是你的利刃，被你的祝福砥砺。我的臂膀强而有力，你的意志坚韧不屈。只要不死之神听到你的祈祷，猎物便注定无法察觉我的脚步。”{n}她手中的匕首亲吻着她的手掌，暗红色的鲜血滴落下来。她的手里不知什么时候出现了一只仪式用杯，将鲜血收集在杯底。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You are my Domin. I am your blade, and I am honed by your blessing. My arms are strong while your will is strong. And as long as the Undying One hears your prayers, my feet will go unheard." {n}Her blade kisses her palm, and dark blood begins to trickle and spread over the bottom of the ritual cup that has just now appeared in her hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你是我的秘者，我是你的利刃，被你的祝福砥砺。我的臂膀强而有力，你的意志坚韧不屈。只要不死之神听到你的祈祷，猎物便注定无法察觉我的脚步。”{n}她手中的匕首亲吻着她的手掌，暗红色的鲜血滴落下来。她的手里不知什么时候出现了一只仪式用杯，将鲜血收集在杯底。{/n}

languages.text: « Vous êtes {mf|mon|ma} Domin et je suis votre lame affûtée par votre bénédiction. Mon bras ne tremblera pas si votre volonté demeure inflexible. Et tant que l'Immortel entendra vos prières, mes pas ne feront pas plus de bruit qu'un soupir. » {n}Sa lame effleure la paume de sa main, d'où s'écoule alors un sang noir qui vient se répandre au fond de la coupe rituelle apparue dans ses mains.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You are my Domin. I am your blade, and I am honed by your blessing. My arms are strong while your will is strong. And as long as the Undying One hears your prayers, my feet will go unheard." {n}Her blade kisses her palm, and dark blood begins to trickle and spread over the bottom of the ritual cup that has just now appeared in her hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes {mf|mon|ma} Domin et je suis votre lame affûtée par votre bénédiction. Mon bras ne tremblera pas si votre volonté demeure inflexible. Et tant que l'Immortel entendra vos prières, mes pas ne feront pas plus de bruit qu'un soupir. » {n}Sa lame effleure la paume de sa main, d'où s'écoule alors un sang noir qui vient se répandre au fond de la coupe rituelle apparue dans ses mains.{/n}

languages.text: "Sen benim Dominimsin. Ben senin lütfunla bilenmiş kılıcınım. İraden güçlü olduğu müddetçe benim kollarım da güçlü olacak. Ölmeyen, dualarımızı işittiği müddetçe adımlarımı kimse duymayacak." {n}Bıçağının avcuna dokunmasıyla birlikte koyu renkli kan sızmaya ve ellerinde bir anda ortaya çıkan ayin çanağının dibinde yayılmaya başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You are my Domin. I am your blade, and I am honed by your blessing. My arms are strong while your will is strong. And as long as the Undying One hears your prayers, my feet will go unheard." {n}Her blade kisses her palm, and dark blood begins to trickle and spread over the bottom of the ritual cup that has just now appeared in her hands.{/n}
